Articles.Content: I did the Mun, now ksp wants me to go to Duna. Where are the Minimus missions???

I actually got them when i actually went to minmus for science purposes. As i had no missions for it beforehand i wasn't expecting to make money but in the end i make a large profit with some extra missions.

No idea why they did not show up earlier, my guess it was just bad luck but now im reading your post got me wondering too!
